home.title: Premium Seafood from Senegal
home.subtitle: Quality frozen fish products for your business
home.qualityDesc: We select only the finest seafood from Senegalese waters
home.featuredSubtitle: Discover our selection of exceptional seafood

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our range of premium frozen seafood

factory.title: Our Factory
factory.subtitle: Modern facilities ensuring quality and safety
factory.intro: Our state-of-the-art factory in Senegal is equipped with the latest technology for processing and freezing seafood products.
factory.certificationsDesc: We maintain the highest standards with international certifications including HACCP, ISO 9001, and EU approval.
factory.capacityDesc: Our facility can process up to 50 tons of seafood daily, ensuring we meet demand while maintaining quality.
factory.technologyDesc: We use cutting-edge freezing technology to preserve freshness and nutritional value.

logistics.title: Global Logistics
logistics.subtitle: Reliable shipping to your location
logistics.intro: We partner with leading logistics companies to ensure your products arrive fresh and on time.
logistics.shippingDesc: We offer various shipping options including air freight, sea freight, and express delivery.
logistics.coldChainDesc: Our specialized cold chain ensures products remain frozen throughout transit.
logistics.trackingDesc: Track your shipment in real-time from our facility to your doorstep.

footer.aboutText: Leading supplier of premium frozen seafood from Senegal to the world.
